description: The objects in this section represent the high level objects within the program. Access to the program normally starts with the VectricJob, and from there you can access the layers holding all the geometry and the current selection state for the job.

classes.name: MaterialBlock
classes.documentation: This object represents the material block within the program. It holds the width, height and thickness of the job and also the XY and Z origins. There is a single instance of the material block in the program. A number of methods are provided to convert between 'absolute' z values and z values relative to the surface of the material.

constructors.label: MaterialBlock()
constructors.documentation: A new object which refers to the single material block within the program.

properties.name: ActualXYOrigin
properties.documentation: XY position for user specified origin position on material (see .XYOrigin)

properties.name: BlcOrigin
properties.documentation: XYZ position for bottom left corner of material block

properties.name: Height
properties.documentation: Height of material - length in Y

properties.name: InMM
properties.documentation: True if the job is in MM else it is in inches

properties.name: MaterialBox
properties.documentation: The 3D bounding box for the material

properties.name: MaterialSurfaceZ
properties.documentation: Z value for surface of material

properties.name: Thickness
properties.documentation: Thickness of material - length in Z

properties.name: Width
properties.documentation: Width of material - length in X

properties.name: CylinderDiameter
properties.documentation: (Rotary Only) The diameter of the material cylinder

properties.name: CylinderLength
properties.documentation: (Rotary Only) The length of the material cylinder

properties.name: XYOrigin
properties.documentation: Value indicating position in material chosen as XY origin. Valid values: MaterialBlock.BLC, MaterialBlock.BRC, MaterialBlock.TRC, MaterialBlock.TLC, MaterialBlock.CENTRE

properties.name: ZOrigin
properties.documentation: Value indicating position of Z origin. Valid values: MaterialBlock.Z_TOP, MaterialBlock.Z_CENTRE, MaterialBlock.Z_BOTTOM

properties.name: FlipDirection
properties.documentation: (Double-Sided Only) Values indicating how we flip the material in a two sided job. Valid values: VectricJob.AROUND_X, VectricJob.AROUND_Y

properties.name: JobType
properties.documentation: Values indicating the type of the current job. Valid values: MaterialBlock.SINGLE_SIDED, MaterialBlock.DOUBLE_SIDED, MaterialBlock.ROTARY

properties.name: RotationAxis
properties.documentation: (Rotary Only) Values indicating the rotation axis of the cylinder. Valid values: MaterialBlock.X_AXIS, MaterialBlock.Y_AXIS

methods.name: CalcAbsoluteZ
methods.documentation: Returns an 'absolute' z value from a z value relative to the surface of the block. Z_value can be negative for values below the surface or positive for values above the surface.

signature.label: CalcAbsoluteZ(z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Returns an 'absolute' z value from a z value relative to the surface of the block.

parameters.label: z_value
parameters.documentation: z_value: number - z value relative to surface of material

methods.name: CalcAbsoluteZFromDepth
methods.documentation: Returns an absolute z value from a depth value below the surface.

signature.label: CalcAbsoluteZFromDepth(z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Returns an absolute z value from a depth value below the surface.

methods.name: CalcDepthFromAbsoluteZ
methods.documentation: Returns a depth below the surface of the material from an absolute z value.

signature.label: CalcDepthFromAbsoluteZ(z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Returns a depth below the surface of the material from an absolute z value.

methods.name: SideZOrigin
methods.documentation: Similar to .ZOrigin, but for the given side

signature.label: SideZOrigin(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Similar to .ZOrigin, but for the given side

methods.name: SideMaterialSurfaceZ
methods.documentation: Similar to .MaterialSurfaceZ for the given side

signature.label: SideMaterialSurfaceZ(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Similar to .MaterialSurfaceZ for the given side

methods.name: SideMaterialBox
methods.documentation: Similar to .MaterialBox for the given side

signature.label: SideMaterialBox(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Similar to .MaterialBox for the given side

methods.name: SideBlcOrigin
methods.documentation: Similar to .BlcOrigin for the given side

signature.label: SideBlcOrigin(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Similar to .BlcOrigin for the given side

methods.name: CalcSideAbsoluteZ
methods.documentation: Similar to CalcAbsoluteZ() for the given side

signature.label: CalcSideAbsoluteZ(side_id: UUID, z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Similar to CalcAbsoluteZ() for the given side

methods.name: CalcSideDepthFromAbsoluteZ
methods.documentation: Similar to CalcDepthFromAbsoluteZ() for the given side

signature.label: CalcSideDepthFromAbsoluteZ(side_id: UUID, z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Similar to CalcDepthFromAbsoluteZ() for the given side

methods.name: CalcSideAbsoluteZFromDepth
methods.documentation: Similar to CalcAbsoluteZFromDepth() for the given side

signature.label: CalcSideAbsoluteZFromDepth(side_id: UUID, depth: number)
signature.documentation: Similar to CalcAbsoluteZFromDepth() for the given side
